gol.viewer

Interface UserInteraction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SidebarLayoutInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiMessenger, GUIViewer

    public interface UserInteraction
    This interface defines the general behavior for sending messages to the user.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alert(java.lang.String text)
      This function shows an alert message to the user.
      boolean ask(java.lang.String text)
      This function shows a question to the user and wait for response.
      boolean askOkCancel(java.lang.String text)
      This function shows a question to the user and wait for response.
      void message(java.lang.String text)
      This function shows a notification dialog to the user.
      void notification(java.lang.String text)
      This function shows a notification message to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • alert

        void alert(java.lang.String text)
        This function shows an alert message to the user.

        - requires: text != null

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:
        text - the detail message string

      • message

        void message(java.lang.String text)
        This function shows a notification dialog to the user.

        - requires: text != null

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:
        text - the detail message string

      • notification

        void notification(java.lang.String text)
        This function shows a notification message to the user.

        - requires: text != null

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:
        text - the detail message string

      • ask

        boolean ask(java.lang.String text)
        This function shows a question to the user and wait for response.

        - requires: text != null

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:
        text - the detail question string
        Returns:
        user's response. true if the user chose yes and false if the user chose no.

      • askOkCancel

        boolean askOkCancel(java.lang.String text)
        This function shows a question to the user and wait for response.

        - requires: text != null

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:
        text - the detail question string
        Returns:
        user's response. true if the user chose OK and false if the user chose CANCEL.
